overview: Travel across four continents, through 19 countries, and into dingy Cambodian karaoke bars, Amsterdamâ€™s infamous red-light district, Moldovan orphanages, legal Nevada brothels, and the street corners and alleyways of metropolises worldwide for more than a glance at the fastest-growing organized crime industry in the world with the groundbreaking, tell-all Nefarious: Merchant of Souls.
tagline: Behind the veil of the sex industry
title: Nefarious: Merchant of Souls
